sub_004_01: Congratulations on clearing the Cortondo Gym!
sub_004_02:
Now that you’ve got a badge from Katy, you’re
entitled to try a special Olive Roll challenge!
sub_004_03:
In this version of the Olive Roll, we’ll keep track
of how long it takes you to finish.
sub_004_04:
And we’ve got lovely prizes for you if you roll
your way to a super-speedy time!
sub_004_05: Ready to try your hand at the special Olive Roll?
sub_004_chose_1_after:
Great! Put in a wish for a good olive harvest, and
roll, roll, roll away!
sub_004_chose_2_after: Your fastest roll yet is [VAR NUM2(0001)]:[VAR NUM2(0002)].[VAR NUM2(0003)]!
sub_004_chose_3_after:
No problem. Just come let me know if you
change your mind.
sub_004_clear_1: Well rolled! Your time was [VAR NUM2(0001)]:[VAR NUM2(0002)].[VAR NUM2(0003)]!
sub_004_clear_2:
You made it to the goal in less than [VAR NUM2(0001)]:[VAR NUM2(0002)].[VAR NUM2(0003)],
so you’ve earned yourself a nice gift!
sub_004_clear_3:
If you can beat the target time of [VAR NUM2(0001)]:[VAR NUM2(0002)].[VAR NUM2(0003)],
there’s a prize with your name on it. Keep rolling!
sub_004_first_clear_1: That was some nice rolling out there!
sub_004_first_clear_2: Let’s see now... Your time was [VAR NUM2(0001)]:[VAR NUM2(0002)].[VAR NUM2(0003)]!
sub_004_first_clear_3:
Since this was your first time finishing the special
Olive Roll, here’s your very own special prize.
